articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: Trade setup for October 13: Charts suggest another 200 point upside for Nifty 50 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Indian benchmark indices closed a little changed after a rangebound session on October 12. As many as six of the top 10 Nifty losers are IT stocks; Tech Mahindra and TCS tumbled the most. Going ahead, the market may continue its range-bound movement until Nif…

articles.author: Sourabh Lele, Ashutosh Mishra
articles.title: Q2 results: HCLTech net beats estimates, but FY24 growth forecast cut - Business Standard
articles.description: HCLTech Q2 Results: The company reported its net new bookings in the quarter at an all-time high of $3.96 billion in total contract value (TCV)

articles.author: ET Telecom
articles.title: CERT-In issues high severity vulnerability warning for Google Chrome; advises users to apply updates - ETTelecom
articles.description: Giving technical details, it said the software affected are "Google Chrome versions prior to 118.0.5993.70/.71 for Windows" and "Google Chrome versions prior to 118.0.5993.70 for Mac and Linux"
